Description: Peavey Classic Fury Bass Guitar. Blond maple wood. Purchased new around 1990. No obvious wear, in excellent condition. Stored for past 20 yrs. Belonged to our son who did not play much. Clearing out storage and no longer want to store this guitar. PRICED TO SELL OVER CHRISTMAS HOLIDAY. Want to sell in local San Diego, CA area so that we can hand deliver. Will ship, but actual shipping cost to be paid by buyer. Returns accepted for 7 days after purchase. Contact me by email with questions. Also look at our ad for VW FIRST ACT, 2007 Classic guitar selling on Ebay. On Dec-06-18 at 11:01:51 PST, seller added the following information: There is remains of a paper sticker on the key head that has been partially removed. I don't know what was on this sticker, it might have been attached by the retail store. I could have removed it with a damp cloth, but decided to leave it alone. There is no serial number on the guitar, just patent numbers as can be seen in the picture.
